attributes.action: Change the skirt length requirements in the UK schools.
attributes.additional_details: Most requirements for school uniform are aimed at girls. Skirt lengths are something not only me but also many others, find is extremely sexist to girls. Having a skirt that does not go to your knees will not affect anyone’s learning. Girls should not be punished for a male’s dirty mind. No one finds legs attracting to them. I don’t see why us girls should be punished for another’s dirty mind. Please help us girls to equality!! It is unfair how it’s mostly us girls getting scolded for uniform!!!
attributes.background: Help young girls be able to wear a skirt to a length they want, without being told off because it’s ‘distracting’ to males.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the detail of school uniform policies are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban uniform in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628871
